value:
Castles and towns... And so many
people... My, it's all so...different
from what I'm used to!

I am half human, half dragon...
But why should halves...divide us?
My halves make me...whole.

How I long for my village. And
most of all...the oasis there.
The waters, so pure!

I have been...outside on rare
occasion. Everyone can seem so
odd to me.$k$pFor instance, some arrows are
called...quarrels. Isn't that
strange?

You there... You must be...
$Nu?$k$pI have seen...your future.

I foresaw that...today would
be a good day.

I foresaw that this would come
to pass.

My future looks suddenly...
very dim.

This—! And my dragon blood—!
So light-headed...

I am...Sophia. I am...? Forgive me—
I get winded. I am a priestess from
the Nabata Desert.

Your future...has shifted and
swirled since we met.$k$pAt first, your future was a fog
that not even my eyes could
pierce.$k$pOver time, I made out the faintest
nimbus around you. A weak
glow, if you will.$k$pThat glow has grown, illumined
by light—many lights, from
many sources!$k$pThese have mystified me until
recently, when I realized that
I...am one of those lights.$k$pYou invite such lights to you,
and your glow is becoming like a
beacon, banishing the fog!$k$pAnd so...I want to stay with you
to see what your future will look
like when the fog...is gone.
My blood... Half is that of dragons.
What relief I feel...when I'm near you.
